title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4216.6 - Expenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4216.6 - Expenses

State Regulations

The applicant will be obligated to pay for expenses incurred
by the corporation in connection with the project, including, but not limited
to, expenses related to appraisals, surveys, title insurance, credit searches, filing fees, public hearing expenses and other requirements deemed appropriate
by the corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4216.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
